description: This is a Java source file defining a Spring Boot REST controller called HelloController, which provides several endpoints: a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller providing endpoints for greeting, documentation redirection, health check, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message when the root URL is accessed.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI documentation page, preserving request scheme, host, and port, based on the incoming HttpServletRequest.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns 'OK' indicating the application's health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns a string containing application information.
